thread.title: Charming Hotel
thread.title_full: Charming Hotel - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: beckyliss
title: Charming Hotel
text:
The hotel is just opposite Port Authority and a few streets away from Times Square. Very accessible if you are planning to visit the Woodbury outlet or taking a shuttle from the airport. The staffs are really friendly like what everyone mentioned and sure is accommodating to our requests. The only complain would probably be the inconsistent hot-water from our shower and the poor elevators that takes ages to arrive during peak hours. Nonetheless, the amenities are great and we loved the kitchenette which came with a dish washer. Do wake up early for the generous servings at breakfast and drop by for the tea break if you are around the corner.
Room Tip: Ask for a high floor room with a view of empire state building See more room tips
